page.title: 07Trade
page.content: The area does not have a shopping precinct as such but a few general stores which sell vegetables,tin foods,dairy products etc.There are no restaurants or cafes in the village but a single fish and chip shop. A small rather shabby{Post Office} sells cards, papers, stamps and people can also obtain money and pensions from there.In addition every Thursday a mobile library visits the town. People visiting the surrounding countryside may stay overnight at a hotel, from the outside it seems very large.An odd co-op retail store has been redeveloped into a freezer centre.The newest facility in the area is the video shop.There are lots of nurseries spread around the area and there is a flower shop and a Turkey farm situated on the a 550. By M Scane,A Wake,C Hewitt.
